PHRASE.LANG: Adorable virtual pets known as "Dolphies" swim around Hudson Gate. They are calm and friendly.
L'Arche d'Hudson est fréquentée par d'adorables petits animaux, les "Dolphies", qui y nagent paisiblement.
Um das Hudson-Tor schwimmen liebenswerte virtuelle Haustiere namens „Dolphys“ herum. Sie sind ruhig und freundlich.
Adorabili animali virtuali noti come "Dolphy" nuotano intorno a Hudson Gate. Sono tranquilli e socievoli.
Las adorables mascotas virtuales llamadas "Dolphies" nadan por Hudson Gate. Son tranquilas y simpáticas.
ハドソンゲート空間内を泳ぐ、バーチャルペット「ドルフィー」です。穏やかな性格で、とても人懐っこいです。
Adorable virtual pets known as "Dolphies" swim around Hudson Gate. They are calm and friendly.
